ul_617808: ...|  xargs sh -c 'for file; do 
                      cp -- "$file" /my/destination/path/ && 
                        chmod 700 /my/destination/path/"$file"; 
                    done' sh

...|  xargs sh -c 'for file; do 
                  cp -- "$file" /my/destination/path/ && 
                    chmod 700 /my/destination/path/"${file##*/}"; 
                done' sh
